Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.gui.controller.scene

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.gui.controller.scene.SceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthController, ConnectionController, EndingController, GameListController, LobbyController, PlayAreaController, RestoringLobbyController, SelectObjectiveController, SelectPlayerColorController, SelectStartingCardSideController
public abstract class SceneController extends Object implements GUIElement
The base controller for each scene. It contains the main method to load a scene

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final View
    view
     

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SceneController(View view)
    It constructs a new SceneController, initializing an empty list to keep all the EventEmitter.Registration needed in a specific scene in order to listen to the events emitted by the View, specified as parameter.

    • view

      protected final View view

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneController

      public SceneController(View view)
      It constructs a new SceneController, initializing an empty list to keep all the EventEmitter.Registration needed in a specific scene in order to listen to the events emitted by the View, specified as parameter.
      Parameters:
      view - The reference to the main View class

  • Method Details

    • loadScene

      public void loadScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage, double width, double height)
      It adds to the main stage the current scene
      Parameters:
      stage - The main Stage to which the scene has to be set
      width - The width of the scene
      height - The height of the scene

    • setFullScreen

      protected void setFullScreen(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      It sets the Stage.fullScreenProperty() to:
      • true, if the stage is not maximized
      • false, if the stage is maximized
      Parameters:
      event - The MouseEvent emitted after clicking the mouse on the maximize/minimize icon

    • openPopup

      protected void openPopup(PopupController popupController)
      It calls the PopupController.loadPopup(Stage, View) method in order to show a customized popup dialog
      Parameters:
      popupController - The main controller for the popup to be shown

    • registerListeners

      protected abstract void registerListeners()
      It allows you to register classes that emit events of interest and specify the method to call in response to the emission of such events

    • getViewRegistrations

      public List<EventEmitter.Registration> getViewRegistrations()
      Returns:
      The list of EventEmitter.Registration with the classes currently listened to
